item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0184; 03:10AM; 3918 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AS5B2M; Koreatown; The first 32 firefighters on scene of a 6-story center-hallway apartment building found fire on the 5th floor. Crews rapidly ascended to extinguish the flames in just 12 minutes (3:22am). No reported injuries.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E27 E29 E52 E6 E82 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA13 RA3 RA35 RA52 RA803 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1529; 05:30PM; 10377 N Rincon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cSuMu5; #Pacoima; Despite high ambient temperatures, 26 firefighters took just 24 minutes, in a well-coordinated offensive attack, to access, confine, and fully extinguish the flames in a small one-story home (755 sq-ft) which involved the living space and the attic. No reported injuries. Cause under active investigation by LAFD Fire Investigators.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC12 CE84 E275 E298 E75 E81 E91 RA898 RA98 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1529; 05:06PM; 10377 N Rincon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cSuMu5; #Pacoima; One-story home with fire showing.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E75 E81 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Red Line; INC#0395; 05:30AM; 899 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2UzBdZG; #Downtown; One adult female was found unconscious on the tracks, and in contact with the third rail (supplies electric current to trains). Firefighter-paramdics removed her from the tracks and are transporting her in grave condition. Nothing further.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 E10 E13 E203 E209 E211 E9 EM1 HR3 RA9 SQ21 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1534; 07:14PM; 1368 W 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RwVTd1; University Park; It took 34 firefighters just 11 minutes to extinguish the flames within a two-story apartment building. Three patients sustained burns (35-year-old male, 30-year-old female, and 10-year-old) and have been transported to a local hospital. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E13 E15 E21 E210 E215 E226 RA246 RA34 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1534; 07:03PM; 1368 W 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RwVTd1; #UniversityPark; Two-story center-hallway apartment building with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E13 E15 E21 E210 E215 E226 RA246 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T26; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1132; 03:34PM; 6502 S 4th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3g4hoBd; #HydePark; Firefighters found a vacant/boarded-up single-family home fully involved with fire and threatening another vacant home next door. Twenty-eight firefighters engaged in an offensive attack on the main structure to extinguish the flames in 24 minutes, and boldly defended the adjacent building to spare it from damage. There were no known occupants inside and no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 CE59 CM20 CM22 E21 E210 E233 E266 E38 E66 RA266 RA66 T10 T33 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1132; 03:10PM; 2529 W Southwest Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cNNbs3; #HydePark; One-story boarded-up home (previous burn) with fire showing.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E38 E66 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1780; 10:22PM; 250 E 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RxMba9; #Florence; It took 36 firefighters (in mostly defensive mode) 33 minutes to extinguish all flames in the vacant home. Firefighters will be on scene for an extended period of time to overhaul the structure. No reported injuries. Unknown cause.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E221 E233 E264 E64 E66 RA257 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1780; 09:49PM; 250 E 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RxMba9; #Florence; One-story, single-family home (possibly vacant) with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 E221 E233 E264 E64 E66 RA257 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange
